name: Brother's Invitation
description:
Tools used:

Unity with Text Mesh Pro, Post Processing Stack, Cinemachine,  2D Pixel Perfect, and Visual Studio.

Paint.net.

bfxr.

Bosca Cieol.

Audacity.

Description:

A short spooky game where you try to find your brother in a old mansion, while using your flashlight as a tool.

Controls:

Movement - A, and D.

Jump - Space.

Mouse cursor - Move flashlight.

Left click - Toggle flashlight.

Escape - Pause.
